body:
After `BEGIN goroutine 2 bt` gdb starts eating all memory quickly. After killing gdb, I get `fatal error: runtime: split stack overflow`

   MemTotal:        3954352 kB
    Linux pebbe.xs4all.nl 2.6.32-5-amd64 #1 SMP Sat Jul 12 16:47:57 UTC 2014 x86_64 GNU/Linux
    go version devel +6b24da6 Sun Jun 14 01:52:54 2015 +0000 linux/amd64
    GNU gdb (GDB) 7.6
